mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Best for ecommerce stores with faster loading speeds and better uptime than GoDaddy. More intuitive website builder with better overall value.

mentionedBy.name: GoDaddy
mentionedBy.notes: Better pricing at $2.69/month vs GoDaddy's $5.99/month. Faster loading speeds, better uptime, and more intuitive website builder. Provides 24/7 support and free domain and email even on lowest-tier plan.

mentionedBy.name: Squarespace
mentionedBy.notes: Most affordable alternative at $2.99-$3.99/month for 48-month subscription. Offered AI website builder with e-commerce suite, better domain features than Squarespace, and free professional email with domain purchase.

mentionedBy.name: Squarespace
mentionedBy.notes: Features powerful AI website builder with e-commerce suite option. Domain features rated better than Squarespace based on research. Includes free professional email with domain purchase, offering strong value proposition.
